title: Embedding Service Returns Tuples
evidence: Logs show "Unexpected embedding type: <class 'tuple'>" hundreds of times
root_cause: get_embedding() method returns (embedding, metadata) tuple instead of just embedding

title: UnifiedSearchService Missing db_manager
impact: keyword_search silently fails, returns empty results
evidence: keyword_search returns 0 results, db_manager is None
root_cause: __init__ method does not require db_manager parameter

title: Intent Classification Uses Random Embeddings
evidence: Logs show "Using fallback random embedding" for every intent example
root_cause: Tuple embeddings cause fallback to random embeddings for training

title: NLU Engine Array Shape Mismatch
evidence: Error: setting an array element with a sequence
root_cause: Tuple embeddings cause numpy array creation failures
